featured.text: Most men use more swear words, while far more women use adjectives such as “super” and “lovely,” and exclamations such as “Goodness me!” and “Oh dear!”

definition.zh_def: 感嘆詞；用來表達強烈情感或反應的詞語。
definition.en_def: A word or phrase that expresses strong emotion or reaction.
definition.example: She let out an exclamation of surprise when she saw the gift.
